entries.title: GraphLoad: A Framework to Load and Update Over Ten-Billion-Vertex Graphs with Performance and Consistency
entries.content: GraphLoad is a scalable graph loading framework eBay developed and deployed in production. It has been loading and updating a graph with over 15 billion vertices and over 20 billion edges since May 2020.
entries.contentSnippet: GraphLoad is a scalable graph loading framework eBay developed and deployed in production. It has been loading and updat
entries.author: Tom Schweiger, Jun Li, Hieu Nguyen, Leo Hu and Sakilaa Gopalsamy

entries.title: The Staging Dichotomy: Part Two
entries.content: A two-part series on how eBay turned around an impeding staging environment into its biggest asset for developer productivity.
